channel.title: Updates on DirtGrub Minecraft PvP
channel.description: Recent content in Updates on DirtGrub Minecraft PvP

item.title: First Update!
item.description: The first post of the official DirtGrub PvP minecraft server package main import ( "fmt" "log" "net" ) const ( website string = "www.dirtgrubo.github.io/dirtgrub:80" ) func main() { _, err := net.Dial("udp", website) if err != nil { log.Fatal("DirtGrub is offline or just taking a nap ", err) } fmt.Print("DirtGrub is fully operational") } This is just some random I code wrote in Golang
